page.title: 13THE LOCAL PARK
page.content: At the park there is a {slide},a{ {monkey bar}and {swings} that are broken.Yesterday I played on the slide 0n my {bike}and on the monkey bar.Paul Armstrong and I did a jump on our bikes.When I went down the slide, I punctured my tyre on some broken glass.Paul and I fixed it.Then we went to build a course for our bikes.My mam says the {council}should clear it up because I am getting too many punctures.The park used to have a see-saw and now we try to build wooden ones.The park is behind the {Elliot {Centre}.At the back of it there are steps.I sometimes go down them.I sometimes race around the {caravan {site }behind the park.
